shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000

shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=treb_thresh=above(treb_att,treb_thresh)*2+
per_frame_2=(1-above(treb_att,treb_thresh))*((treb_thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_3=mid_thresh=above(mid_att,mid_thresh)*2+
per_frame_4=(1-above(mid_mid_att,mid_thresh))*((mid_thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_5=vol_thresh= (pfthresh+treb_thresh+mid_thresh)/3;
per_frame_6=q6 = vol_thresh;
per_frame_7=q7 = treb_thresh;
per_frame_8=q8 = mid_thresh;
per_frame_9=//wave_r = 0.65 + 0.5*sin(time*1.13);
per_frame_10=//wave_g = 0.65 + 0.5*sin(time*1.23);
per_frame_11=//wave_b = 0.65 + 0.5*sin(time*1.33);
per_frame_12=
per_frame_13=wave_r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(1.6*time);
per_frame_14=wave_g = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(4.1*time);
per_frame_15=wave_b = -1 + (1-wave_r + 1-wave_g);
per_frame_16=warp = 0;
per_frame_17=pfthresh = above(bass_att,pfthresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,pfthresh))*((pfthresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_18=pfdx_r = equal(pfthresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(pfthresh,2))*pfdx_r;
per_frame_19=pfdy_r = equal(pfthresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(pfthresh,2))*pfdy_r;
per_frame_20=rg1 = abs(sin(time));
per_frame_21=rg2 = 0*above(rg1,0.75) + 3*below(rg1,0.25) + 1*above(rg1,0.25)*below(rg1,0.5)+
per_frame_22=2*above(rg1,0.5)*below(rg1,0.75);
per_frame_23=rg3 = if(equal(pfthresh,2),rg2,rg3);
per_frame_24=
per_frame_25=q1 = wave_r;
per_frame_26=q2 = wave_g;
per_frame_27=q3 = wave_b;
per_frame_28=
per_frame_29=cog = ocog+0.005*(bass+bass_att+(bass*bass_att)-2);
per_frame_30=ocog = below(cog,30000)*cog;
per_frame_31=q4 = cog;
per_frame_32=rcog = orcog + 0.5*(int(rand(100))*0.01);
per_frame_33=orcog = below(rcog,20000)*rcog;
per_frame_34=q5 = rcog;
per_frame_35=
per_frame_36=ob_r = q1;
per_frame_37=ob_g = q2;
per_frame_38=ob_b = q3;
per_pixel_1=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_2=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_3=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_4=tg1 = abs(sin(time));
per_pixel_5=tg2 = 3*above(tg1,0.75) + 4*below(tg1,0.25) + 5*above(tg1,0.5)*below(tg1,0.75)
per_pixel_6=+ 3.14*above(tg1,0.25)*below(tg1,0.5);
per_pixel_7=tg3 = if(equal(thresh,2),tg2,tg3);
per_pixel_8=
per_pixel_9=zoom = zoom + 0.2*sin(tg3*q4);
per_pixel_10=zoom = zoom - 0.1*sin(q4)*sin(2*tg3*ang);
per_pixel_11=rot = rot + sin(q4)*cos(tg3*ang);
warp_1=`shader_body {
warp_2=`float2 uv1 = float2(uv.x-0.5,uv.y-0.5);//*aspect.xy;
warp_3=`
warp_4=`
warp_5=`float2 zz = uv1 *texsize.xy *q28;
warp_6=`
warp_7=`zz =mul(zz,float2x2(_qb));
warp_8=`
warp_9=`float2 h1 = clamp(tan(zz.yx),-16,16) * cos(zz*2*q9);
warp_10=`
warp_11=`uv.xy += h1 * .01;
warp_12=`
warp_13=`float r = tex2D (sampler_noise_hq,uv/6 + .001*time).x*16;
warp_14=`float2 uv6 = uv1;
warp_15=`float sr = sin(r); float cr = cos(r);
warp_16=`uv6 = mul(uv6, float2x2(cr,sr,-sr,cr));
warp_17=`float3 mus = 1/(sqrt(uv6.y)) * ((.5-q30)+.03*q26);
warp_18=`
warp_19=`float3 crisp = tex2D(sampler_main,uv) + .02*mus;
warp_20=`//crisp = lerp(crisp, crisp.bgr, saturate(crisp));
warp_21=`ret = crisp-.0 -.3* GetBlur3(uv) - rad/10 ;
warp_22=`}
comp_1=`float2 d, uv_y;
comp_2=`float3 dx, dy;
comp_3=`shader_body
comp_4=`{
comp_5=`
comp_6=`    d = texsize.zw*8;
comp_7=`    dx = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
comp_8=`    dy = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
comp_9=`
comp_10=`float3 base = GetPixel(uv);
comp_11=`float3 emboss = (-dx + dy + 1)*1.2;
comp_12=`
comp_13=`    d = texsize.zw*2;
comp_14=`    dx = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
comp_15=`    dy = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
comp_16=`
comp_17=`float grad = length(float2(dx.x,dy.x));
comp_18=`
comp_19=`ret = lerp( float3(0.5,0.4,0.6)*base.x*emboss.x,
comp_20=`            float3(8,5,2)*grad,
comp_21=`            grad*4.2
comp_22=`          ); 
comp_23=`ret = lerp(ret,4*ret,GetPixel(uv).y*0.5-GetBlur1(uv).z*0.3*float3(0.3,1,1));
comp_24=`
comp_25=`grad = length(float2(dx.z,dy.z));
comp_26=`ret = lerp(ret, float3(2,2,0), grad*0.7);
comp_27=`}
comp_28=`
